Title: Happily Ever Aftermath
Plot: Nick and Hank are called to investigate the mysterious death of a wealthy matriarch, after her stepdaughter loses everything in a Ponzi scheme. Meanwhile, Juliette  does some digging into the mysterious death of Nick?s parents in an effort to help him find closure.
GuestStars: David Clayton Rogers, Amanda Schull, Tom Wright, Patricia Hunter, Niene Pugliano, Orianna Herrman, David Williams, Felicia Tuck
